    • net.minecraft.client.gui中Container的使用

      参数类型为Container的net.minecraft.client.gui中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void GuiRepair.sendAllContents​(Container containerToSend, NonNullList<ItemStack> itemsList)
      update the crafting window inventory with the items in the list
      void GuiRepair.sendAllWindowProperties​(Container containerIn, IInventory inventory)  
      void GuiRepair.sendSlotContents​(Container containerToSend, int slotInd, ItemStack stack)
      Sends the contents of an inventory slot to the client-side Container.
      void GuiRepair.sendWindowProperty​(Container containerIn, int varToUpdate, int newValue)
      Sends two ints to the client-side Container.

    • net.minecraft.entity.player中Container的使用

      声明为Container的net.minecraft.entity.player中的字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      Container EntityPlayer.inventoryContainer
      The Container for the player's inventory (which opens when they press E)
      Container EntityPlayer.openContainer
      The Container the player has open.
      参数类型为Container的net.minecraft.entity.player中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明

      update the crafting window inventory with the items in the list
